p.5: An opportunity for a talented Bioinformatics Software Engineer to join a hyper growth HealthTech start-up, who have currently raised over $20M so far and are set to close in on a large round of Series B funding, backed by some of the most infamous Biotech investors and VCs.
p.7: As a Senior Bioinformatics Engineer, you will work closely with both the engineering and commercial team, delivering clear customer feedback to assist in developing software and algorithms for processing genomic data at scale.

text: , and relay clear customer feedback to the product, technical, and commercial teams.

li.2: Leverage Python Python/C++ and continuously deploy to the AWS ecosystem with the help of Git, Docker, and Terraform.
li.3: Have the opportunity to process genomic data at scale using the company's ground-breaking tooling
li.4: Assist in maintaining and enhancing this tooling

li: Experience with common genomic data analysis tooling like bcftools, samtools, plink, bwa, GATK, etc.
li.1: Software development experience in Python and proficiency working in a *nix environment.
li.2: Well-versed in communicating with customers and building customer relationships.
li.3: Systematic problem-solving approach coupled with strong verbal and written communication skills, and a sense of ownership and drive.

li: Compensation: Up to $185K cash + equity package- depending on experience
